revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4KEc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 266 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640DBTC-90G;MX S08197 29LV640DBTC-90G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY57V281620FTP-6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8366SR; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1C:DF |oui = 00:1C:DF |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.30;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 9-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, Gemtek type1 pinout,, (57600 8N1) |jtag = no |specialfeat = |flags = boot log |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = Belkin_N+_XXXXXX,Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170 |defaultssid_regex = ^Belkin_N+_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,,^Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170$ |default_ch = |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTR-235GN |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (Was) |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/15/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 722868673799 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Manuf. (and perhaps designed) by [[Gemtek]], WRTR-235GN (WRTR-235GN_V01). :There is a [[NEC]] USB controller on-board. The default SSID appears to be '''Belkin_N+_XXXXXX''' (where XXXXXX is replaced by the last three octets of the wireless interface MAC address [capital letters]). :When resetting to factory defaults, it seems the device temporarily assumes the SSID of '''Belkin_N+_Wireless_180170'''. :'''Belkin_N+_Guest''' is the default SSID for the guest network, but this is not enabled by default. ==Links of Interest== *[https://web.archive.org/web/20130512005320/http://www.belkin.com/us/support-product?rnId=335 Support page] (archive 12 May 2013) *[https://openwrt.org/toh/belkin/f5d8235-4 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=75953 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (thread goes nowhere, no donated HW) ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/belkin/belkin_f5d8235-4_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/belkin/f5d8235-4 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt288x |arch = mipsel_mips32r2 |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 22.03.6 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
    J6
      (   )
(GND) (RxD)
(GND) (   )   --> to copper shielding
(VCC) (   )
(VCC) [TxD]
